title: Sakal Sandhya
overview: Joy, a thief, helps Anjali to become a singer and falls in love with her. But their romance is disrupted when her wedding is fixed with another boy, Sandip. Anjali's stepmother, Madhobi, blamed Joy as a thief and threw him out from her house. Anjali tried to find out Joy. At the moment of a function Anjali told the whole story of her life to the audience and proposed to Joy and accepted him..
